user_query: I'm planning a vacation to a tropical destination with my family. Can you recommend some popular tourist attractions and restaurants in the area? Also, provide me with the current weather forecast and the top hotels available in that location.

TaskList.description: Search for popular tourist attractions in the selected tropical destination.
Find recommended restaurants in the selected tropical destination.
Fetch the current weather forecast for the selected tropical destination.
List the top hotels available in the selected tropical destination.
